parameters.name: AlertGroup
parameters.description:
The alert group. Only one alert group is supported.

>  This parameter is required only for the first modification.

parameters.name: CnameCustomDomainName
parameters.description: If you set **CnameMode** to **CUSTOM**, you must specify the CnameCustomDomainName parameter, which must be set to a primary domain name.

parameters.name: CnameMode
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use a system-assigned canonical name (CNAME) or a custom CNAME to access GTM. Valid values:

*   **SYSTEM_ASSIGN**: system-assigned CNAME
*   **CUSTOM**: custom CNAME

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the GTM instance.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description:
The name of the GTM instance.

>  This parameter is required only for the first modification.

parameters.name: LbaStrategy
parameters.description:
The balancing policy. Valid values:

*   **ALL_RR**: load balancing
*   **RATIO**: weighted round-robin

>  This parameter is required only for the first modification.

parameters.name: UserDomainName
parameters.description:
The primary domain name.

>  This parameter is required only for the first modification.
